summary: Changes weight for crafting materials, pelts and some misc items.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][size=4]Cleaned with TES5Edit[/color][/size]

[size=3]There\'s an Unoffical Patches compatible version.[/size]

[color=red][size=3]Requires Dawnguard DLC. [/color][/size] (except gold weight)

[b]Description:[/b]

This mod changes some items weight with more realistic values by considering items\' size.

[b]1. Dragon\'s parts:[/b]

Dragon bone                 15 -> 10
Dragon scale                 10 -> 6

[b]2. Gold:[/b]

Gold                            0 -> 0.01

There\'s an optional download for gold only.

[b]3. Materials:[/b]

Which material can be found in real life get the original weight from density (for 1 g). Others approach to craftable items (with smithing waste). For example the vanilla steel plate armor weight is 38, but the crafting materials is only 6.

a) Ingots

Corundum                     1 -> 4
Gold                             1 -> 17
Refined Malachite          1 -> 4
Iron                             1 -> 8
Refined Moonstone        1 -> 3,5 
Orichalcum                   1 -> 7
Quicksilver                    1 -> 6 
Silver                           1 -> 10
Steel                           1 -> 8
Ebony                          1 -> 11 
Dwarven metal              1-> 5   (because the scrap meltdown)

b) Ores

Ores are not perfectly clean sources, but while in vanilla game they have same weight than ingots, with this mod they have 80% of that.

Dwemer Scrap Metal: (How many Dwemer metal ingots you can melt down)

Solid Dwemer Metal                   25 -> etalon
Bent Dwemer Scrap Metal          2 -> 15
Large Decorative Dwemer Strut   15 -> 10
Large Dwemer Plate Metal          2 -> 15
Large Dwemer Strut                   20 -> 15
Small Dwemer Plate Metal           2 -> 15

[b]4. Petls[/b]

Name                 weight /price

Wolf                        6/80
Icewolf                   6,5/120
Sabre cat                8/140
Snow sabre cat        8/180
Fox                        4/50
Snow Fox                4/70
Deer pelt                6/50
Deer hide               6/50
Bear                      10/160
Cave bear               11/180
Snow bear              11/200
Cow                       6/40
Goat                      4/40
Horse hide             5/50

Werewolf               16/800

Vale deer              6/320
Vale sabre cat        8/380

[b]5. Misc[/b]

Horker Tusk        weight: 1 -> 2
                         price:  15-> 35

Firewood            5 -> 8
